body: Ah. Sorry for the confusion with the "?". It seems that the problem is because of something I put in the last release. I will try to fix this soon. Mona, to be clear about the issue, your EnergyPlus simulation is not running correctly because the weather file has no extreme weeks that are used to size the HVAC system. The issue is not with the surface result reader even though I know that is where you are seeing the error. I will report back soon with the fix.
